altername_name: Kidou Senkan Nadesico: Yappari Saigo wa Ai ga Katsu
name: Kidou Senkan Nadesico: Yappari Saigo ha 'Ai ga Katsu'?
overview: Kidou Senkan Nadesico: Yappari Saigo ha 'Ai ga Katsu'? (機動戦艦ナデシコ ～やっぱり最後は「愛が勝つ」？～) is an adventure game for the Sega Saturn based on the Kidou Senkan Nadesico franchise.
